item.title: Overfitting vs Underfitting - Looking for the sweet spot
item.description: Generalization is a machine learning concept that evaluates how a model performs on testing or unseen data. A model could score 99% accuracy on a training model, however if it cannot replicate the accuracy results then the model is useless. Our model could either underfit or overfit in these situations …
item.dc:creator: Sara Massey

item.title: Getting Started with Linear Regression
item.description:
Data science is divided into six steps:

1. Define problem.
2. Gather Data
3. Explore Data
4. Model with Data
5. Evaluate model
6. Answer the problem.

Once you are done with first three steps, you are ready to implement a model on your data. This article will explain and …
item.dc:creator: Sara Massey
